dialogue.speaker: Lady Eira
dialogue.text: Welcome, adventurer, to the land of Eldoria. I am Lady Eira, ruler of this realm.

dialogue.speaker: Arin the Brave
dialogue.text: Greetings, milady. We've come seeking fortune and glory in your lands.

dialogue.speaker: Lady Eira
dialogue.text: I sense that you are not ordinary travelers. You have a certain... aura about you. Tell me, what brings you to our humble kingdom?
